participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and a bit emotional after her recent breakup, she is trying to find joy in small things like her pet fish.
participant_1.background: i've a pet fish. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago. i turned 18 years old yesterday. my favorite color is orange.
